sql-case.value: CREATE TABLE t_log(id int PRIMARY KEY, status varchar(10))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_log(id int PRIMARY KEY, status varchar(10))
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t_log(id int PRIMARY KEY, status varchar(10))
CREATE TABLE t_log_bak_1 AS SELECT * FROM t_log
CREATE INDEX t_log_index USING BTREE ON t_log (id)
CREATE INDEX t_log_index ON t_log (id, status(10))
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX t_log_unique_index ON t_log (id)
CREATE FULLTEXT INDEX t_log_fulltext_index ON t_log (column2)
CREATE SPATIAL INDEX t_log_spatial_index ON t_log (column3)
